156 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const CBL::CBLState& state) {
157  switch ( state ) {
158  case CBL::CBLState::STARTING:
159  stream << "STARTING";
160  break;
161  case CBL::CBLState::REQUESTING_CODE_PAIR:
162  stream << "REQUESTING_CODE_PAIR";
163  break;
164  case CBL::CBLState::CODE_PAIR_RECEIVED:
165  stream << "CODE_PAIR_RECEIVED";
166  break;
167  case CBL::CBLState::REFRESHING_TOKEN:
168  stream << "REFRESHING_TOKEN";
169  break;
170  case CBL::CBLState::REQUESTING_TOKEN:
171  stream << "REQUESTING_TOKEN";
172  break;
173  case CBL::CBLState::STOPPING:
174  stream << "STOPPING";
175  break;
176  }
177  return stream;
178 }
179 
180 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const CBL::CBLStateChangedReason& reason) {
181  switch ( reason ) {
182  case CBL::CBLStateChangedReason::SUCCESS:
183  stream << "SUCCESS";
184  break;
185  case CBL::CBLStateChangedReason::ERROR:
186  stream << "ERROR";
187  break;
188  case CBL::CBLStateChangedReason::TIMEOUT:
189  stream << "TIMEOUT";
190  break;
191  case CBL::CBLStateChangedReason::CODE_PAIR_EXPIRED:
192  stream << "CODE_PAIR_EXPIRED";
193  break;
194  case CBL::CBLStateChangedReason::NONE:
195  stream << "NONE";
196  break;
197  }
198  return stream;
199 }
